meridian presents to you a range of stylish and attractive hand bags. This tie model style with the combination of two color will give you an attractive look while on the go and comfortable nautical satchel has plenty of two compartment along with back pockets to keep your personal stuffs organized. Made from PU material with synthetic leather, the bag is very comfortable to carry and durable. Dimension: from strap(top) to base is 19 inches. LxHxW (inches) :15 x 10.75 x 4.5
